statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, investment FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE cost > 100000;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE return < 0;
SELECT project_name, investment, cost FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, return FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE investment >= 500000;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE investment > 100000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, cost, return FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE cost < 50000 GROUP BY project_name HAVING return > 0;
SELECT project_id, project_name, investment FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE cost BETWEEN 20000 AND 30000 ORDER BY investment ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, investment, cost, return FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE return IS NOT NULL AND cost > 50000;
SELECT project_name, cost FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE cost < 40000);
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE id = 5;
SELECT description, cost_amount FROM costs WHERE cost_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT project_id, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM costs GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM investments WHERE investment_date > '2022-01-01' AND investment_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investments GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, cost_amount FROM investments JOIN costs ON investments.id = costs.project_id WHERE cost_amount > 5000 ORDER BY cost_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount, cost_amount FROM investments LEFT JOIN costs ON investments.id = costs.project_id WHERE cost_amount IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, investment_date FROM investments WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), investment_date) > 30 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments;
SELECT project_name, investment_date, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, investor_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investments GROUP BY project_name, investor_name;
SELECT project_name, cost_type, cost_amount FROM costs WHERE cost_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, return_type, return_amount FROM returns ORDER BY return_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, investor_name, investment_amount FROM investments ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, investment_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, cost_type, cost_amount FROM costs WHERE cost_type = 'Marketing' ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, return_type, return_amount FROM returns WHERE return_amount > 10000 AND return_type = 'Dividend' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, investor_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM investments WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, investor_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investor_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY project_name ASC, investment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM costs ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, cost_category FROM costs JOIN projects ON costs.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_date DESC, project_name ASC;

SELECT project_name, investment_amount FROM investments JOIN projects ON investments.project_name = projects.project_name WHERE projects.project_type = 'Construction' AND investment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM costs LEFT JOIN projects ON costs.project_id = projects.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_amount > 5000 AND project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM projects WHERE project_location = 'New York');
SELECT project_name, AVG(investment_amount) AS avg_investment FROM investments GROUP BY project_name HAVING AVG(investment_amount) > 20000 ORDER BY avg_investment DESC;
SELECT * FROM Investments;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount FROM Investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Costs ORDER BY cost_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, cost_amount FROM Costs WHERE cost_type = 'Marketing';
SELECT project_name, return_amount, return_date FROM Returns WHERE return_amount > 50000 ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Investments ORDER BY investment_date DESC, investment_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM Investments GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_investment > 100000 ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT project_name, cost_type, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM Costs GROUP BY project_name, cost_type ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, AVG(return_amount) AS avg_return FROM Returns GROUP BY project_name HAVING avg_return > 5000 ORDER BY avg_return DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investor_type, COUNT(*) AS total_investments FROM Investors GROUP BY investor_name, investor_type HAVING total_investments > 5 ORDER BY total_investments DESC;
